articles.title: Placido Domingo Linked to Sex Trafficking Investigation in Argentina
articles.description: Opera star Placido Domingo’s name has appeared in an investigation of a sect-like organization in Argentina that also had U.S. offices and whose leaders have been charged with crimes, including sexual exploitation.
articles.content:
Placido Domingo during the 10th International Congress of Excellence organized by Madrid's Regional Government held at Teatro de la Zarzuela in Madrid, Spain on July 15, 2019.

articles.title: Bizarrap & Quevedo Add Fifth Week at No. 1 on Argentina Hot 100
articles.description: Plus, Spanish rapper Rels B scores first top 10 with “Cómo Dormiste?”
articles.content: Bizarrap and Quevedo’s “Bzrp Music Sessions, Vol. 52” banks a fifth week at No. 1 on the Billboard Argentina Hot 100 chart (dated August 13), four weeks after the song became the Argentinian producer’s sixth leader on the list, with five of those fro... [1298 chars]

articles.title: Argentina's new economy chief highlights plans to boost reserves
articles.description: Argentina's latest economy minister, Sergio Massa, stressed the need to boost hard currency reserves on Thursday, pointing to new debt repurchase operations that could help, as well as advances in talks with the country's key farm sector.
articles.content: Argentina's latest economy minister, Sergio Massa, stressed the need to boost hard currency reserves on Thursday, pointing to new debt repurchase operations that could help, as well as advances in talks with the country's key farm sector. President A... [2563 chars]

articles.title: UPDATE 2-Argentina's corn crop seen growing 6%, wheat area flat
articles.description: (Adds wheat forecast)BUENOS AIRES, Aug 18 (Reuters) - Argentina's corn harvest for the current 2021/2022 season is estimated to reach 52 million tonnes, according to data released by the Buenos Aires Grains Exchange on Thursday, up about 6% from last week's 49 million tonne forecast.Dry weather last week favored the corn crop, the exchange said, while it also raised its
articles.content:
